channel.title: World of Warcraft Blamed for Porn's Decline
channel.description:
[quote] "The games are competition for porn. Fans jerk off to porn and are done, but you can keep playing a game." - Aiden [/quote] [url]https://www.tomshardware.com/news/wow-porn-world-warcraft-whorecraft,9425.html[/url]
I lol'd.

item.title: World of Warcraft Blamed for Porn's Decline
item.dc:creator: Havelok
item.description:
I’ve experienced the fetish escalation, but I don’t believe it has affected me in my day to day attraction toward women.

There is a large difference between a 2D image on a screen and a real, warm, breathing human being.

I think where it will start to get dangerous is when we start to see realistic sex robits and later VR stuff that is indistinguishable from real life.

That raises even more questions, like if the creators of said simulations would be permitted to satiate all fetishes, including ones that are still illegal at this point in time.

item.title: World of Warcraft Blamed for Porn's Decline
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
I have managed not to let porn influence me so far. Just like games, movies and so on. Porn is no different to be honest.
It’s pretty obvious that doing the stuff they do in porn isn’t actually any good for the woman.
And the slippery slope thing, I haven’t wanted to get into anything “harder” (I find anal disgusting anyway). Same with drugs. I like doing weed, but I’ve never felt the need to try coke or anything.

Read full topic

item.title: World of Warcraft Blamed for Porn's Decline
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
Or you can not be a moron and not confuse fantasies with reality.

It has nothing to do with being a moron or not. The turn-on is triggered subconsciously without you noticing. After watching a certain amount of porn you need harder videos to turn you on - just like with a drug. A one on one vanilla sex video doesn’t do the trick anymore, so it needs to be a FFM threesome video. Or anal. Or fetish. Or whatever. And it keeps getting harder to come back to normal.

You start getting uninterested in real life girls who don’t surpass porn stars in sex-appeal. You start thinking that a blowjob is a proper form of foreplay and something every girl would do gladly for you. Or that biting her nipples and rubbing her pussy like there’s no tomorrow actually is enough to turn her on.

Gradually, and often without you noticing, your sexual behavior changes to the worse. And sometimes you are lucky and notice before becoming a rapist. I am glad I was so lucky.

Those of you familiar with porn: Try and check the backstory scenarios of your favourite porn videos for aspects of sexual exploitation, abuse and/or forced sex.

There are many porn videos with content like that out there. Babysitter does her job badly and “gets punished”, schoolgirl has to sleep with teacher for passing a class or exam… and that’s only two examples.

In real life it’s a crime. In porn it’s a turn-on. In Hentai even serious rape is used as a turn-on.

I can imagine some people getting violent against women because of that influence.

Read full topic

item.title: World of Warcraft Blamed for Porn's Decline
item.dc:creator: Deutscher_Scharfschu
item.description:
DansonDelta40:

Porn is also said to have a negative influence on the development of young people’s sense of sensibility when it comes to sex, thus ruining their sex lives in later life, because thy attempt to imitate what they have seen on screen and experience massive failure and traumatizing damage to body and soul.

So maybe a world without porn could have beneficial influence on people’s sex lives… but I honestly don’t know.

Personal experience?

In all honesty though, what porn does do to youths is make them think that having a 12" anaconda dick is normal. the first time i had sex with a girl i had thought that i would be too small, but apparently i have an average size penis, and she apparently had a less than average size vagina. So you can imagine, it wasn’t a 1-2-3 thing, it was very aquard until i got we got into the rhythm of things. I didn’t actually become good at sex till my third girlfriend (mostly because she was a slutty bitch). Anyways, Porn Sex is very unrealistic, though i wouldn’t considering it damaging, everything is learned through experience.

Read full topic
